name: 3DMark2011 SE Project File
summary: Learn about .3DP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: DirectX 8 has largely been replaced by version 9 and 10. Therefore, 3DMark2011 SE is not as commonly used anymore and is considered legacy software by Futuremark.

description: File created by 3DMark2011 SE, a program used for benchmarking PCs with DirectX 8; saves the system specs, a list of tests to run, and the results after running the benchmarks; allows the results to be saved and reviewed.
